title: Trump Threatens 100% Tariff On BRICS Countries If They Undercut US Dollar
content: US President-elect Donald Trump on Saturday demanded that BRICS member countries commit to not creating a new currency or supporting another currency that would replace the United States dollar or face 100% tariffs.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump on Saturday demanded that BRICS member countries commit to not creating a new currency or supporting another currency that would replace the United States dollar or face 100% tariffs.

title: Aid Worker Killed In Palestine "Took Part In Oct 7 Attack", Says Israel
content: US charity World Central Kitchen said Saturday it was "pausing operations in Gaza at this time" after an Israeli air strike hit a vehicle carrying its workers.
summary: US charity World Central Kitchen said Saturday it was "pausing operations in Gaza at this time" after an Israeli air strike hit a vehicle carrying its workers.

title: "Completely Fine": Pak Minister On Man Pushed From Container
content: Pakistan's Information Minister Attaullah Tarar on Saturday said that the man seen in a viral video falling from a container during a Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) protest in Islamabad is "completely fine."
summary: Pakistan's Information Minister Attaullah Tarar on Saturday said that the man seen in a viral video falling from a container during a Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) protest in Islamabad is "completely fine."

title: US 'Black Friday' Online Spending Put At Record $10.8 Billion
content: American consumers spent a record $10.8 billion online during "Black Friday" promotions, with many using artificial intelligence tools to find the best deals, Adobe Analytics announced Saturday.
summary: American consumers spent a record $10.8 billion online during "Black Friday" promotions, with many using artificial intelligence tools to find the best deals, Adobe Analytics announced Saturday.

title: Justin Trudeau Meets Donald Trump In Florida As Tariff Threats Loom
content: Justin Trudeau had an "excellent conversation" with Donald Trump at the president-elect's Florida estate, Canada's prime minister said Saturday, as the United States' neighbors scramble to blunt the impact of Trump's trade threats.
summary: Justin Trudeau had an "excellent conversation" with Donald Trump at the president-elect's Florida estate, Canada's prime minister said Saturday, as the United States' neighbors scramble to blunt the impact of Trump's trade threats.

title: Model Fatally Shoots Husband Before Taking Her Own Life In Luxury US Home
content: A 27-year-old model allegedly fatally shot her husband before taking her own life inside their luxury home in Florida, US.
summary: A 27-year-old model allegedly fatally shot her husband before taking her own life inside their luxury home in Florida, US.

title: Italy In Talks With India On Port Cooperation, Blue Economy: Report
content: Italy is reportedly in talks with India to expand cooperation on port infrastructure, including ship and yacht manufacturing sectors. The discussion encompasses broader areas of blue economy and space exploration, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday.
summary: Italy is reportedly in talks with India to expand cooperation on port infrastructure, including ship and yacht manufacturing sectors. The discussion encompasses broader areas of blue economy and space exploration, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday.

title: Why Thousands Of Georgians Are Protesting In Tbilisi After EU Bid Halted
content: Thousands of protesters returned outside the parliament in Tbilisi on Saturday to protest against the Georgian government's decision to suspend European Union (EU) membership talks amid a post-election crisis.
summary: Thousands of protesters returned outside the parliament in Tbilisi on Saturday to protest against the Georgian government's decision to suspend European Union (EU) membership talks amid a post-election crisis.

title: War Could End If Unoccupied Parts Of Ukraine Come Under NATO: Zelensky
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky called Friday for NATO to offer guaranteed protections to parts of Ukraine controlled by Kyiv in order to "stop the hot stage of the war."
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky called Friday for NATO to offer guaranteed protections to parts of Ukraine controlled by Kyiv in order to "stop the hot stage of the war."

title: 50-Year-Old Indian-Origin Man Gets Life Term For Girlfriend's Murder In UK
content: An Indian-origin man who brutally beat up his girlfriend to death at his home in East Midlands region of England, has been sentenced to life imprisonment by a UK court.
summary: An Indian-origin man who brutally beat up his girlfriend to death at his home in East Midlands region of England, has been sentenced to life imprisonment by a UK court.

title: 2nd Hindu Priest Arrested In Bangladesh Amid Protests: ISKCON Member
content: Days after the arrest of Spiritual leader Chinmoy Krishna Das, another Hindu priest was arrested in Bangladesh's Chattogram, sources said on Saturday.
summary: Days after the arrest of Spiritual leader Chinmoy Krishna Das, another Hindu priest was arrested in Bangladesh's Chattogram, sources said on Saturday.

title: Indian Student Shot Dead At Chicago Petrol Pump Where He Worked
content: A student from Telangana was shot dead by armed men at a petrol pump in the US city of Chicago on Friday.
summary: A student from Telangana was shot dead by armed men at a petrol pump in the US city of Chicago on Friday.

title: Musk Reveals What He Discussed With Barron Trump At Thanksgiving Dinner
content: Billionaire Elon Musk has revealed what he and Barron Trump discussed while celebrating Thanksgiving at Mar-a-Lago.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk has revealed what he and Barron Trump discussed while celebrating Thanksgiving at Mar-a-Lago.

title: Former My Chemical Romance Drummer Bob Bryar Found Dead At 44
content: Bob Bryar, former drummer for My Chemical Romance, was found dead in his Tennessee home at 44. Law enforcement reported no foul play and noted his body was severely decomposed.
summary: Bob Bryar, former drummer for My Chemical Romance, was found dead in his Tennessee home at 44. Law enforcement reported no foul play and noted his body was severely decomposed.

title: Aleppo Attacked, Bashar Assad In Trouble. Syria Heading For Regime Change?
content: Syrian Islamist rebels have launched one of their biggest offensive against President Bashar al-Assads forces in years, sweeping through government-held towns before taking control of "half of the city of Aleppo".
summary: Syrian Islamist rebels have launched one of their biggest offensive against President Bashar al-Assads forces in years, sweeping through government-held towns before taking control of "half of the city of Aleppo".

title: Covid Virus Remains In Skull For Years After Infection: Study
content: SARS-CoV-2, the virus behind the Covid-19 pandemic, remains in the skull and meninges for years after infection, leading to a long-lasting effect on the brain, according to a major German study.
summary: SARS-CoV-2, the virus behind the Covid-19 pandemic, remains in the skull and meninges for years after infection, leading to a long-lasting effect on the brain, according to a major German study.

title: Syrian Rebels Control 'Most' Of Aleppo City Amid Clashes: War Monitor
content: A monitor of Syria's war said on Saturday that jihadist rebels now control a majority of Aleppo city, reporting Russian air strikes on parts of Syria's second city for the first time since 2016.
summary: A monitor of Syria's war said on Saturday that jihadist rebels now control a majority of Aleppo city, reporting Russian air strikes on parts of Syria's second city for the first time since 2016.

title: Man Kidnapped By Brother-In-Law Over Suspicion That He Married For Visa
content: A video of a kidnapping carried out by a group of men in Australia was presented in Parramatta District Court, New South Wales, on November 28.
summary: A video of a kidnapping carried out by a group of men in Australia was presented in Parramatta District Court, New South Wales, on November 28.

title: New York Fruit Seller's Reaction After Banana Auctioned For $6.2 Million
content: Shah Alam sold the banana for just 35 cents (Rs 29) not realising it would go on to become the centrepiece of Maurizio Cattelan's controversial artwork, ‘Comedian’.
summary: Shah Alam sold the banana for just 35 cents (Rs 29) not realising it would go on to become the centrepiece of Maurizio Cattelan's controversial artwork, ‘Comedian’.

title: On Camera, Woman, 41, Crushed By Cop In Front Of Her Children In US
content: The Houston Police Department has released a horrifying dashcam video showing the moment a 41-year-old woman was mowed down by a police officer in front of her screaming children.
summary: The Houston Police Department has released a horrifying dashcam video showing the moment a 41-year-old woman was mowed down by a police officer in front of her screaming children.
